name: Daemon_9
description: It's not a movie... it's not a game... it's both. A new kind of interactive thriller that puts you in the heart of the story.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7+ Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 320 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7+ Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 320 MB available space Additional Notes: Monitor size 1920 x 1080 or larger
